label: Country
comment: The area of land that belongs to a nation together with its properties, such as population, political organization, etc., used or referenced for trade purposes.

datatypeProperties.comment: A unique country identifier for this location party.
A name or symbol, expressed as text, of a radioactive radionuclide.

objectProperties.comment: A subordinate country sub-division within this trade country sub-division.

referencedBy.comment: A country included in this trade geopolitical region.
A country that constitutes a nationality by origin, birth, or naturalization for this transport person.
